thread.title: Antonio Brown showed up to NFL Honors looking like this, but had a good excuse
thread.title_full: Antonio Brown showed up to NFL Honors looking like this, but had a good excuse

title: Antonio Brown showed up to NFL Honors looking like this, but had a good excuse
text:
— melissa stark (@melissastark) February 4, 2017 
Another stunt by the self-promoting Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver? Not according to him. Brown tweeted out a pretty good excuse. Come on @FedEx I thought u deliver awaiting on my suit for Nfl awards today said delivered no package come on ma #SuperBowl51 pic.twitter.com/RTd6rSCT0R 
— Antonio Brown (@AntonioBrown) February 4, 2017 
(OK, that doesn’t explain his hair.) 
Then this happened: @AntonioBrown I'm sorry, I really don't know who Antonio Brown is. I'm just trying to help him with his package. Please DM your name, 
— FedEx Help (@FedExHelp) February 4, 2017 
AB might need to promote himself a little more … and may try using UPS (“What can Brown do for you?”).
